```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE,
                      warning=FALSE,
                      message=FALSE)

# Load Functions.
source("../../functions/myFunctions.R") 

# Load packages.
installMissingPackages(
  c(
    # Include statistical packages.
    "performance",
    "lmerTest",
    "lme4",
    "optimx",
    "MuMIn",
    # Include packages for tidy output.
    "tidyverse",
    "broomExtra",
    "sjPlot",
    "formattable",
    "knitr",
    "RColorBrewer",
    # Include packages for %in% %notin% syntactic notation
    "mefa4"
  )
)

# Set themes and colour schemes.
theme_set(theme_minimal(base_size = 14))

```

```{r load corpus}
l_star_h_types = c("L*H", "^[L*]H", "L*^[H]", "^[L*H]")

# Load Corpus
m_corpus <- get_m_corpus("../data/m_corpus.csv")  %>%
  # Select only columns for analysis
  select(
    speaker,
    gender,
    mode,
    prompt,
    acc_phon,
    fin_phon,
    h_f0) %>% 
  filter(acc_phon %in% l_star_h_types)  %>% 
  mutate(acc_phon = factor(acc_phon,
                           levels = l_star_h_types), 
         #, fin_phon = factor(if_else(fin_phon %in% c("^[L%]","%"), "%", "L%"),
          #                 levels=c("%", "L%"))
         )
```

```{r set equation and optimizer}
my_equation = formula(
  h_f0 ~ mode * acc_phon
  + gender
  + fin_phon
  + (1 + mode + acc_phon | speaker)
  + (1 | prompt)
)



my_equation = formula(
  h_f0 ~ mode * acc_phon
  + gender
  + fin_phon
  + (1 | speaker)
  + (1 | prompt)
)
optimizer = "optimx"
```

-  convergence and singularity issues
-  random intercepts only model works.

### Model with prompt as random intercept

```{r run initial model, fig.height=3, fig.width=9}

# run model
h_f0_model <-
  lmer(my_equation,
       data = m_corpus,
        control = lmerControl(
          optimizer = optimizer,
          calc.derivs = FALSE,
          optCtrl = list(
            method = "nlminb",
            starttests = FALSE,
            kkt = FALSE
          )
        )
      )

summariseLME(h_f0_model, run_step=TRUE)

```

```{r random effect of prompt, fig.height=2, fig.width=5}
plot_model(h_f0_model,
           type="re",
           axis.title = c("semitones", "prompt"),
           title="random effect: prompt",
           show.values = T)[2]
```

-  removing prompt as it causes singularity in l_f0 and has little effect here.

### Final Model

```{r run model without prompt, fig.height=3, fig.width=9}
my_equation = formula(
  h_f0 ~ mode * acc_phon
  + gender
  + fin_phon
  + (1 | speaker)
  )
# run model
h_f0_model <-
  lmer(my_equation,
       data = m_corpus,
        control = lmerControl(
          optimizer = optimizer,
          calc.derivs = FALSE,
          optCtrl = list(
            method = "nlminb",
            starttests = FALSE,
            kkt = FALSE
          )
        )
      )

summariseLME(h_f0_model, run_step=TRUE,
              write="../output_model_anovas/Mode_PA_h_f0_anova.csv")

```


```{r make tidy model, fig.height=5, fig.width=7, results="asis"}

h_f0_model.tidy <- analyseModel(h_f0_model,
                                write="../output/Mode_PA_h_f0"
                                )
h_f0_model.tidy$table

```
